lst.name: sentence
lst.str: An uncertain regulatory environment, disputes over Canadian pricing policies and unusually warm winters are working against a quick recovery in the sector, a number of corporate and government speakers told an energy conference here.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Besides the extra-territorial effect, there is the potential that Conadian producers and consumers may end up subsidizing the cost of transportation services originally incurred on behalf of U.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: But FERC Chairman Martha Hesse told the conference the ruling was really intended "to assure equal, fair and open competition in the pricing of natural gas sold within our country -- whatever the source of the gas."
